title: Research and professional experience
text:
BS: Agricultural Engineering (Universidad Mayor de San Andres - Bolivia) Crop modeling on nitrogen fertilization and irrigation scheduling
Irrigation systems management consultant
MSc:Soil Science – Soil Fertility (Louisiana State University) Sensor based (UAV and Proximal sensor) cover crop nutrient content Cover cropping effect on sugarcane productivity and nutrient cycling
PhD: BAE (NC State – STEPS) Process-based modeling and stable isotopic source tracking for phosphate source attribution in an agricultural watershed
